name: Karen Lokant
text: This hungry howies is super great. I get curbside delivery,  and when I place more order there always great. Pizza, howie bread are great.  People who,take order, or bring my food are always fantastic.

name: Pride & Prejudice
text:
My son and I stopped off and went on and were greeted immediately.  Very pleasant young lady took our order.  We got our order "The Works" minus Green Peppers with Xtra Cheese ... with Garlic Crust!   Omg! Delicious
Came out Fast & Delicious!  Will come back again!

text: Hungry Howie's is my favorite pizza and I love the variety of flavored crusts. The staff of this Westland store is unfailingly friendly and efficient when I come in to pick up my orders.  The app is easy to understand and flows logically. ‚Ä¶More

Smh I hope this is just a one time thing because I've ordered pizza in the past from them an it was good.
